name: DaysRemaining
0:
”Alexa, open days remaining”
”Alexa, start days remaining”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: days remaining
des: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until all New Year and Christmas. Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a above specific events.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
